data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Free kick Bragantino.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fortaleza's Osvaldo breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 4, Rafael Traci awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Rafael Traci signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Fortaleza are pushing forward but Marlon's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 13, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Bragantino.
Bruno Tubarao (Bragantino) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 17, Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Fortaleza.
Bragantino needs to be cautious. Fortaleza have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 19, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Ball safe as Fortaleza is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Fortaleza.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Rafael Traci awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Fortaleza.
In the minute 24, Jackson is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 25, Bragantino are whistled for offside.
The home team has substituted Jackson with Paulao. Rogerio Ceni is thus making his first change.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bragantino are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 27, Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
David of Fortaleza gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 29, Goal kick for Bragantino at Estadio Castelao.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 30, Rafael Traci signals a Bragantino throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Bragantino.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
In the minute 33, Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Bruno Melo (Fortaleza) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Fortaleza to check on Bruno Tubarao, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 34, Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fortaleza drive upfield and Marlon gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bragantino defender.
Bruno Tubarao for Bragantino is back on the field again.
In the minute 36, In Fortaleza Bragantino attack through Artur. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 37, Bragantino's Artur is on target but unsuccessful.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Bragantino just outside Fortaleza's area.
Bragantino are coming forward and Leonardo Realpe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 39, Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
Goal! Fortaleza have got their heads in front thanks to a Wellington Paulista strike.
Great play from Bruno Melo to set up the goal.
In the minute 40, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
In Fortaleza, Juan Quintero (Fortaleza) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 42, Rafael Traci awards Bragantino a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Rafael Traci will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rafael Traci awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Fortaleza.
The first-half is over at Estadio Castelao.
At Estadio Castelao, Weverson is shown a red card and sent off.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Estadio Castelao.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Fortaleza.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 48, David for Fortaleza has been booked by Rafael Traci and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 50, Rafael Traci awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Bragantino.
Can Fortaleza capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 56, Leonardo Realpe (Bragantino) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
David has recovered and rejoins the match in Fortaleza.
The match at Estadio Castelao has been interrupted briefly for a check on David, who is down injured.
In the minute 59, Bragantino have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Great finish from Romarinho to give Fortaleza a 2-0 lead.
In the minute 62, Fortaleza pushes forward through Wellington Paulista, whose finish on goal is saved.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Bragantino.
The away team replace Bruno Tubarao with Barreto.
In the minute 64, Bragantino's Weverton gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 65, Rafael Traci signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 66, Rafael Traci signals a throw-in for Fortaleza, close to Bragantino's area.
It seems as if David is unable to continue. Yuri Cesar replaces him for the home team.
Ederson is on a sub for Osvaldo for Fortaleza.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Bruno Melo (Fortaleza) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 67, Felipe de Oliveira Conceicao (Bragantino) is making a second substitution, with Leandrinho replacing Lucas Evangelista.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Romarinho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fortaleza.
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Tinga.
In the minute 74, Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 75, Free kick Bragantino.
Fortaleza drives forward and Yuri Cesar gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Rogerio Ceni (Fortaleza) has taken off Tinga who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Gabriel Dias is the replacement.
Can Fortaleza capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bragantino's half?
Throw-in for Fortaleza close to the penalty box.
In the minute 76, Rogerio Ceni is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio Castelao with Franco Rodrigo Fragapane replacing Romarinho.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 79, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Aderlan is replacing Weverton for the away team.
Jan Hurtado is replacing Chrigor for Bragantino at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 81, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team have replaced Artur with Luis Phelipe. This is the fifth substitution made today by Felipe de Oliveira Conceicao.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
In the minute 83, Free kick Bragantino.
Rafael Traci awards the home team a throw-in.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Bragantino.
In the minute 86, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bragantino's Aderlan has been booked in Fortaleza.
Wellington Paulista puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
In the minute 86, Gabriel Dias with an assist there.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Fortaleza.
Jan Hurtado of Bragantino smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
At Estadio Castelao the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Fortaleza.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Free kick Fortaleza.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
Rafael Traci blows to end the match. The final score is 3-0.
